definition: appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent

sentences.english: One key problem when analyzing actual acoustic signal in phase space is how to reduce the noise and lower the embedding dimension.
sentences.chinese: 實際水聲信號在相空間中分析時的首要問題是降噪。

sentences.english: Phase-space reconstruction theory of multivariate time series is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了多變量時間序列相空間重構理論。

sentences.english: How to determinate those parameters of the time delay method were studied.
sentences.chinese: 並深入分析了延遲時間和相空間維數的確定原理。

sentences.english: We shows that an inhomogeneous superfluid state is most widespread in the phase diagram.
sentences.chinese: 作者發現了一種非均勻的超流相在相空間占主導地位。

sentences.english: The pseudo random of chaotic state is described according to the motion of point in phase.
sentences.chinese: 用相空間表示點的運動來描寫混沌態的贗隨機變化。

sentences.english: It proposed the approach of solving three basic crack tip fields in phase space.
sentences.chinese: 給出了三種基本形式裂紋端部場在相空間內求解方法。

sentences.english: In the phase space of the elastic parameter, the generalized linear inversion equations are presented.
sentences.chinese: 在彈性參數的相空間中，得到廣義線性反演方程。

sentences.english: The character of the phase space of subsystem is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 研究了路段交通子系統的相空間特徵。

sentences.english: The recurrence plots and quantification recurrence analysis on the basis of state space reconstruction are explored.
sentences.chinese: 研究了基於相空間重構的遞歸圖及定量遞歸分析。

sentences.english: There are many uneven factor in the phase space of multi-particle.
sentences.chinese: 末態粒子相空間存在着各種非均勻因素。
